text: HTafv <7cfy <TJH wfearvt 379 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (aem 4aat &r <otari 4ud4) 477 /Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India WA: Extn; 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 & 6, #qer-10, ETG; # frt _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/09-10/ Tolling options /CMD-CO/Vol. II 22.06.2010 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCQMMERCIAL OPERATIONS 122 Sub:: Guidelines for  procurement of fee collection agencies through Competitive Bidding System. 1_ This circular is issued in supersession of earlier Cir. 120 dated 24.5.2010. The user fee collection, henceforth on all the sections of National Highways, except BOT projects, will be undertaken on the following modes: - (a) OMT (b) By Open Competitive bids. (c) By engaging DGR Sponsored Agency in case of selected plazas, in Jammu & Kashmir, North East States or disturbed areas Chairman NHAI has been designated as the Competent Authority to decide the mode of departmental collection in case the performance of the selected mode is not satisfactory Or there is no response to a particular mode. 2 The procedure of engaging the agency through DGR is modified vide our circular 119 dated 24.05.2010. 3. Procedure_for_procurement of user_fee_collection agency_for_User Collection: (i) The process of procurement of user fee collection agency by calling open competitive bids is to be started with immediate effect: (ii) The bids, as provided in the draft bid document; will be invited at CGM- RO level The submission of bid will take place at two places; (a) NHAI  HQ Dwarka (b) The office of RO concerned. The bids will be opened in the office of RO after   collecting the documents submitted at both the places. This will help to ensure fair and competitive bidding: In order to enter into a contract with the fee  collecting agency through open bid system, & draft bid document is enclosed (iii) The complete bid document will be available on the NHAI website httpiL Lwwwnhai org well in time as well as in the office of CGM-RO concerned and the process should start as per schedule given in the NIT.
